## Self-checklist

**General**

* [ ] Tested on **large screens**
* [ ] Tested on **small screens**
* [ ] Confirmed **accessibility requirements**

**Features/Enhancements**

* [ ] Confirmed **design** against included mockups

**Defects**

* [ ] Confirmed **existing workflows** unaffected by fix
